revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot
revision.text: {{Article history|action1=GAN |action1date=16:06, 31 August 2009 (UTC) |action1link=talk:Vikos-Aoos National Park/GA1 |action1result=failed |action1oldid=311055846 |action2=GAN |action2date=17:07, 6 November 2009 (UTC) |action2link=talk:Vikos-Aoos National Park/GA2 |action2result=passed |action2oldid=324277436 |action3=PR |action3date=15:30, 18 July 2010 |action3link=Wikipedia:Peer review/Vikos-Aoos National Park/archive1 |action3result=reviewed |action3oldid=374139415 |action4=FAC |action4date=00:04, 24 November 2010 |action4link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Vikos–Aoös National Park/archive1 |action4result=not promoted |action4oldid=398390270 | topic = geography |currentstatus=GA }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Greece|class=A|importance=Mid|topic=Geo}} {{WikiProject Geography|class=A|importance=Low}} {{WikiProject Protected areas|class=A|importance=Mid}} }} ==Untitled== Onno: Shall we move the Vikos Gorge to a separate page? :I apologize for not noticing this question in a timely manner. Time has answered it: since some time there is a separate article for the [[Vikos Gorge]]. But compared to the Vikos-Aoos National Park article, the Vikos gorge article needs some work. - [[User:Onno Zweers|Onno Zweers]] ([[User talk:Onno Zweers|talk]]) 20:59, 19 July 2010 (UTC) == Photo request == [[:Image:Vikos-gorge-copyright-onno-zweers.jpg]] looks great, but it's copyrighted. —[[User:Keenan Pepper|Keenan Pepper]] 22:35, 12 July 2006 (UTC) Thanks for the compliment! I have re-added the photo with a different license. I'll have a look for more photos that illustrate the park and the area. [[User:Onnozweers|Onno Zweers]] 11:24, 17 May 2007 (UTC) == Map == I think we need a map of the national park! How can we get one? —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:Onno Zweers|Onno Zweers]] ([[User talk:Onno Zweers|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/Onno Zweers|contribs]]) 21:01, 19 July 2010 (UTC) I filled a request to the map workshop.[[User:Alexikoua|Alexikoua]] ([[User talk:Alexikoua|talk]]) 21:20, 19 July 2010 (UTC) == More photos? == I've uploaded two more photos, but haven't embedded them yet. What do you think, are they useful? File:D70-0568-2-Vikos-village-and-Astraka.jpg|[[Vikos-Aoos National Park]]. The village Vikos in the center; in the background is [[Tymfi]] peak Astraka. File:D70-1532-voidhomatis-path.jpg|Hikers along the river Voidomatis, [[Vikos-Aoos National Park]]. We can create a gallery section and add them there.[[User:Alexikoua|Alexikoua]] ([[User talk:Alexikoua|talk]]) 22:24, 19 July 2010 (UTC) == Azonal gallery forest? == What's an "azonal gallery forest"? I think it would be a good idea to explain this (possibly by linking to a relevant article). - [[User:Onno Zweers|Onno Zweers]] ([[User talk:Onno Zweers|talk]]) 09:01, 20 July 2010 (UTC) I've linked to [[gallery forest]] but I'm still not sure what "azonal" means. - [[User:Onno Zweers|Onno Zweers]] ([[User talk:Onno Zweers|talk]]) 10:42, 20 July 2010 (UTC) Some explanation is given here: [[http://www.waldwissen.net/themen/umwelt_landschaft/wasserschutz/fva_wasserhandbuch_erlen_eschenwald_EN]].[[User:Alexikoua|Alexikoua]] ([[User talk:Alexikoua|talk]]) 21:13, 10 August 2010 (UTC) ==A-class== After a generally supportive and productive peer review on this article, I'm now nominating it for A-class, feeling that it fulfills the criteria, and as a final stage before submitting it for FAC...[[User:Alexikoua|Alexikoua]] ([[User talk:Alexikoua|talk]]) 23:19, 8 August 2010 (UTC) :It is indeed a very nice article, which I feel can safely go forward. --[[User:Sulmues|'''S'''ulmues]] ([[User talk:Sulmues|talk]]) 14:36, 24 August 2010 (UTC) ::Ditto, as I said in the peer review. I will upgrade it right now. [[User:Cplakidas|Constantine]] [[User talk:Cplakidas| ✍ ]] 11:03, 19 October 2010 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Vikos–Aoös National Park]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=707457042 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive {newarchive} to http://www.sciencedirect.com/science?_ob=MImg&_imagekey=B6VR3-487F13Y-3-F&_cdi=6223&_user=275166&_orig=search&_coverDate=04%2F01%2F2003&_sk=999759998&view=c&wchp=dGLbVtz-zSkWA&md5=79ea7bb224074bcd86d52938b3afa888&ie=/sdarticle.pdf When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 00:10, 29 February 2016 (UTC)
